about_the_game:
Crossing the wasteland of the apocalypse, the zombie hunting feast led by Aina! In this desperate era, she is not only a hope for survival, but also a lone hero searching for the antidote formula and saving the world.

Personalize your hero's journey, choose from a variety of cool skins to showcase your unique combat style. The equipment library is full of surprises, dozens of weapons can be freely mixed and matched, creating your exclusive doomsday weapon library, making every shot full of strategy and power.

Every adventure is an unknown challenge, and the random task flow takes you to experience endless post apocalyptic adventures. From simple trials to hellish challenges, there are multiple difficulty modes for you to conquer and test your ultimate survival abilities.

Get cards, upgrade and upgrade again, giving your heroes and weapons super powerful abilities to face even stronger enemies.

Faced with dozens of terrifying bosses and elite monsters, show your courage and wisdom. Every battle is a ultimate test of your will to survive. The dual upgrade system of weapons and heroes allows your strength to evolve continuously with battles, until you become an unbeaten legend in the apocalypse.

Join this adventure that combines thrilling shooting and deep exploration, and search for hope with the beautiful protagonist in despair, writing your own doomsday legend! "

Background of the story:

In the distant year 2689, the Earth was shrouded in a shadow of despair as an unprecedented virus ravaged the globe, transforming 99% of humanity into unconscious zombies. The remaining few survivors huddled in a few safe zones, barely surviving, and the lights of civilization were in danger.

A brave and resilient female scientist voluntarily joins an elite exploration team to search for the legendary antidote material formula. Faced with endless ruins and unknown dangers, she did not choose to retreat, but resolutely embarked on a lonely adventure.

This solo adventure heroine has proven through her actions that even in the darkest moments, hope and courage never go out.

name: Hades-Plan
short_description: This game is from a third person perspective, focusing on the adventure of beautiful warriors fighting against zombies. Integrating shooting pleasure, close combat, and fashionable dressing up. Set in the future, mysterious viruses ravage and humanity faces a crisis of apocalypse.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
